name: The Terminator: Remastered Edition
overview: In this project i changed: -The whole character animations that look messy in the original. -Fixed the 1984 Kyle Reese sprite feet graphics that look misaligned from the ground with and tried to draw a Nike Vandal for it. -Redrew some details in the Reese sprites to look more solid. -Improved the color palette from the 1984 Kyle Reese sprite to look more like the SEGA CD version. -Changed the grenade graphic used by Reese in the 1st level that looks like a Bomberman bomb in the original with a graphic that look more like the bomb that they used in the Future scenes of the movie. -Improved the overall color count adding more diversity in the color choices. -FM instruments changed to get a stronger sound. -PCM percussion, screaming and SFX to more powerful sounds. -Fixed Some Enemies animation -Moved the song “TUNE 1″ to play in the STAGE 2B, the unused song “Termination” to play in the 3rd cut-scene and the song “Trough the Flames” to play in the 4th cut-scene. -60hz Music optimization by Dustin.Odell -Redrawn Title screen graphics by Dustin.Odell
